<h1 align="left">3d Shape Visualization</h1>
<p>Visualization of various 3d shapes in 2d space.</p>

Video Demo
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DcCE7UvDWak>



<h2>Download</h2>
<p>Install Python dependices Pygame run the main.py file</p>
